7980.quoteText:
You can cancel your service any time.
However, no refunds are offered for any unused portion of time in a billing period.
7980.title: The service has a no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy

7981.quoteText:
Right to be forgotten

Accounts can be deleted at any time from your Account Settings page, or by contacting support.
7981.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
